Dialogue.Page: Good job! You found me!
Anything else?
Have you forgotten? I'm Geswaldo the Magic Talking Jellyfish!

DialogueOption.Text: I still don't know who you are.
Oh yeah! It's not often I see you around.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>*sigh* (Ernesto, I've had it with you hogging up the spotlight)</size>
Yeah that's for sure! My husband always hogs up the spotlight.
Being an easter egg.
I'm also looking for Ernesto. He left the house after a heated argument we had last night.
I came here thinking he would have fled to his mom's place, but I don't see him here.
He could be anywhere at this point. He could be deeper in the Bramble, he could be committing tax evasion, or even stuck in a simulation!

DialogueOption.Text: What were you two fighting about?

Dialogue.Page: Ernesto's been bragging a little bit lately about his popularity, and last night I finally snapped.
Our heated words set the room ablaze as our argument got more intense. And once Ernesto had enough...
...he tried to beat with me with a rock...
<size=20>*sniff*</size> I miss Ernesto before his fame. He's just not the same anymore...

DialogueOption.Text: So now you're trying to be the easter egg?
After all that, can't you just dump him?

Dialogue.Page: Yeah, this whole argument was something I started anyway. Ernesto still cares about me and I still care about him.
I was thinking I could apologize to Ernesto. Maybe we can do this Easter Egg thing as a couple!
No! I still love him and he still loves me! I started that debate so I feel like I need to solve it, by being the easter egg.
Who knows? Maybe we can do this Easter Egg thing as a couple!
Really?
I know I'm taken but...Ernesto is kind of taking that fame thing too high over his head...
I'll think about it.
Thought about it.
Nope.
What did you say?
You better watch who you're dealing with.
You and your pathetic scout will not even make a dent in me!
I have more voltage than all of your riced Nomai equipment combined.
Consider your days numbered, pal.
Now go bother someone else, you salamoron.
Bye bye.
